Ubuntu Latvian Translators is Latvian Linux Center (http://llc.smg.lv) work group, which translates Ubuntu to Latvian/Russian.

More information - 
 Latvian Linux Center - http://llc.smg.lv

 Contact person: Ivars Tenters <ivars.tenters@smg.lv>
 
Latvian Linux Center is a part of SMG Latvia, limited (www.smg.lv).

Partners:
  Latvijas Atvērtā Koda Asociācija - http://www.laka.lv

  LU Linux Centrs - http://linux.edu.lv
